pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data CricketBest Home FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Cookie Policy Welcome to CricketBest! This Cookie Policy outlines how we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our fantasy cricket game platform. Understanding Cookies Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device to help the site function more efficiently and provide a better user experience. Cookies allow us to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or past actions. Types of Cookies We Use At CricketBest, we utilize different types of cookies for various purposes: Essential Cookies: These cookies are crucial for the basic functions of our website. They enable you to navigate our site and access its core features. Performance Cookies: These cookies collect anonymous data on how visitors use our website, allowing us to optimize its performance. We use this information to improve the user experience and identify any issues that users may encounter. Functionality Cookies: These cookies remember choices you make, such as your username, language, or the region you are in. This helps us provide a more personalized experience. Targeting Cookies: These cookies track your browsing habits to deliver relevant advertisements. They also limit the number of times you see an ad and help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Managing Your Cookie Preferences You have the ability to control the use of cookies on our website. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. Please note that disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain parts of our site. For detailed information on how to manage and delete cookies. To opt out of tracking by Google Analytics on all websites. Third-Party Cookies We may also use third-party cookies to help us with market research, revenue tracking, and improving site functionality. These third-party service providers have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. Changes to Our Cookie Policy We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our data use practices. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our cookie practices. Contact us If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at cricketbest@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. 1. Information We Collect: - We collect personal information, such as name, email, and phone number, when you use our services or sign up for our updates. - Additionally, we gather non-personal information, such as IP address, browser details, and device information, to enhance the functionality of our website and services. 2. Use of Your Information: - We use your personal information to process orders, facilitate communication, and provide customer support. - Non-personal information may be utilized for analytics, marketing initiatives, and improvements to our online platform. 3. However, we share data with trusted service providers for website operations and service delivery. 4. Your Rights: - You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data and may opt out of receiving promotional communications. 6. Policy Changes: - We reserve the right to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time, with changes taking effect immediately upon publication.
